channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- LOGO! 8 BM (incl. SIPLUS variants)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- LOGO! 8 BM (incl. SIPLUS variants)

item.title: CVE-2022-36360|2024-08-03T10:00:04.365Z -- siemens -- logo%21%208%20bm%20%28incl.%20siplus%20variants%29
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in LOGO! 8 BM (incl. SIPLUS variants) (All versions < V8.3). Affected devices load firmware updates without checking the authenticity. Furthermore the integrity of the unencrypted firmware is only verified by a non-cryptographic method. This could allow an attacker to manipulate a firmware update and flash it to the device.
